description: Comprehensive policy with SCALPEL, SHADOW, and CINDERELLA protocols

NORMAL.rationale: Monitor only - no system changes allowed

EMERGENCY.description: Emergency mode - fix ONLY affected services with time limits

service_restrictions.rule: Can only modify services in incident scope or unhealthy services

EMERGENCY.rationale: Fix only what's broken - healthy services remain protected

service_targeting.description: Actions must target only affected services
service_targeting.enforcement: SCALPEL protocol validates service health and incident scope

impact_simulation.enforcement: SHADOW protocol provides pre-flight impact reports
